name: Essential of Skeletal Radiology Books
descr:
The fully updated Third Edition of this succesful text covers the full spectrum of radiology, continuning its tradition of execellence. Useful for both a learning tool across the chiropractic curriculum and as a reference and clinical aids to practitioners, the text helps readers distinguish key rediologic features - invaluable in clinical decision making.

This edition incorporates the latest imaging technologies - including SPECT bone scan, diagnostic ultrasound, helical 3D CT, and MRI - and features more than 4500 images obtained with state-of-the-art techniques. Coverage includes new chapters on soft-tissue imaging and paraspinal abnormalities and more information on sports related injuries.
